    get_summary_stats

    get_summary_stats.Rd

    Compute all relevant summary statistics given a dataframes of all numerical columns.

    Usage

    get_summary_stats(data)

    Arguments

    data

    a dataframe

    Value

    a dataframe

    Examples

    X <- sim_clust(2, 100, dmin = 0.5, rmin = 0.3, nind = 10)
get_summary_stats(X)
#>                  x1         x2          x3         x4          x5          x6
#> mean      0.2056752 -0.2976619  0.17671325  0.2328328 -0.45552745 -0.39792185
#> sd        0.9845433  0.9782158  1.01886867  1.0191708  0.94917258  0.87954076
#> min      -2.4828579 -2.7163076 -2.22451513 -2.5914173 -2.38763881 -2.63422441
#> max       2.0432364  2.3169640  2.48596838  2.2532848  1.92737940  2.13523144
#> skewness -0.3457023  0.1061926  0.19550838 -0.2281989 -0.05727619  0.03586486
#> kurtosi  -0.1680281 -0.2908425 -0.65706315 -0.3991922 -0.43334466 -0.08084141
#> q25      -0.3451366 -0.9977119 -0.56449893 -0.4580405 -1.05114893 -1.06163620
#> q50       0.2349745 -0.2528540  0.02227213  0.2670326 -0.48598249 -0.33458613
#> q75       0.8853698  0.2845820  0.86394780  0.9416822  0.15067528  0.19067211
#>                  x7         x8          x9        x10      group
#> mean      0.1466249 -0.4091593  0.21380779 -0.2946087  1.5000000
#> sd        0.9712414  0.9943254  1.03832694  1.0229732  0.5025189
#> min      -3.1694966 -3.1594443 -1.90778156 -3.0247924  1.0000000
#> max       2.2668004  1.6899101  2.45411125  2.0033158  2.0000000
#> skewness -0.3544673 -0.1123914  0.02475769 -0.2418679  0.0000000
#> kurtosi   0.4964435 -0.3079347 -0.74060172 -0.1661996 -2.0199000
#> q25      -0.3920265 -1.0587841 -0.44492508 -0.8677816  1.0000000
#> q50       0.1633315 -0.4168522  0.09236098 -0.2583401  1.5000000
#> q75       0.7569791  0.3300396  1.05540523  0.3258470  2.0000000
